channel.title: CVE Feed for wpsoul -- Greenshift – animation and page builder blocks
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wpsoul -- Greenshift – animation and page builder blocks

item.title: CVE-2024-44005|2024-09-18T14:39:10.088Z -- wpsoul -- greenshift%20%E2%80%93%20animation%20and%20page%20builder%20blocks
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Wpsoul Greenshift – animation and page builder blocks allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Greenshift – animation and page builder blocks: from n/a through 9.3.7.
